column1: '''''The 1981 J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar''''' was the official Tolkien calendar published by [[Ballantine Books]] in [[1980]]. It features art by Douglas Beekman, Michael Herring, Rowena Morrill, Judy King Rieniets and [[Darrell Sweet]] based on ''[[The Hobbit]]'', ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' and ''[[The Silmarillion]]''.
